title: Authors and Citation
text: Uchida M (2024). navigatr: Navigation Menu Pipe-Friendly Data Processing. R package version 0.2.1, https://uchidamizuki.github.io/navigatr/, https://github.com/UchidaMizuki/navigatr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {navigatr: Navigation Menu for Pipe-Friendly Data Processing},   author = {Mizuki Uchida},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.2.1, https://uchidamizuki.github.io/navigatr/},   url = {https://github.com/UchidaMizuki/navigatr}, }

what: Navigation Menu for Pipe-Friendly Data Processing
title: Navigation Menu for Pipe-Friendly Data Processing
text: navigatr provides navigation menus input forms. navigation menu allows piped data processing hierarchical data structures. activating menu items, operations item can performed maintaining overall structure attributes. core functions package follows, activate() accesses menu item. itemise() enters values form. rekey() rekey_with() renames key menu item.

title: Navigation Menu for Pipe-Friendly Data Processing
text: can install navigatr CRAN. can also install development version GitHub.

title: Navigation Menu for Pipe-Friendly Data Processing
Navigation Menu for Pipe-Friendly Data Processing
text: build new navigation menu, give new_menu() unique keys list corresponding values. upper rows show menu items (keys left, value summaries right). defining pillar::obj_sum(), can change way summaries displayed. can activate menu item activate(). Activating menu item allows perform operations active item. activate() turns navigatr_new_menu object navigatr_nav_item object, deactivate() turns back. rekey() function used change key activated menu item. can also build nested navigation menu. activate items, specify multiple variables.
code: band <- new_nav_menu(key = c("band_members", "band_instruments"),                      value = list(band_members, band_instruments)) band #> # ☐ band_members:     tibble [3 × 2] #> # ☐ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # Please `activate()`. band <- band |>   activate(band_members) |>   filter(band == "Beatles") band #> # ☒ band_members:     tibble [2 × 2] #> # ☐ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   name  band    #>   <chr> <chr>   #> 1 John  Beatles #> 2 Paul  Beatles band <- band |>    deactivate() band #> # ☐ band_members:     tibble [2 × 2] #> # ☐ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # Please `activate()`. band |>    activate(band_instruments) |>    rekey("new_band_instruments") #> # ☐ band_members:         tibble [2 × 2] #> # ☒ new_band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   name  plays  #>   <chr> <chr>  #> 1 John  guitar #> 2 Paul  bass   #> 3 Keith guitar bands <- new_nav_menu(key = c("key1", "key2"),                       value = list(band, band)) # A list of menu objects bands |>    activate(key1, band_instruments) |>    select(name) #> # ☒ key1: nav_menu [2] #> #   ☐ band_members:     tibble [2 × 2] #> #   ☒ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 1] #> # ☐ key2: nav_menu [2] #> #  #> # A tibble: 3 × 1 #>   name  #>   <chr> #> 1 John  #> 2 Paul  #> 3 Keith

title: Navigation Menu for Pipe-Friendly Data Processing
code: input <- new_nav_input(key = c("key1", "key2")) input #> # ✖ key1: chr [0] #> # ✖ key2: chr [0] #> #  #> # Please `itemise()`. input |>    itemise(key1 = "value1",           key2 = "value2") #> # ✔ key1: chr [1] #> # ✔ key2: chr [1] #> #  #> # Please `itemise()`.

what: Activate or deactivate a menu item — activate
title: Activate or deactivate a menu item — activate
text: Activates menu item syntax dplyr::pull(). Activating menu item allows perform operations active item. activate() turns navigatr_nav_menu object navigatr_item object, deactivate() turns back.

title: Activate or deactivate a menu item — activate
code: activate(.data, ..., .add = FALSE)  # S3 method for navigatr_nav_menu activate(.data, ..., .add = FALSE)  # S3 method for navigatr_item activate(.data, ..., .add = FALSE)  deactivate(x, ..., deep = TRUE)  # S3 method for navigatr_nav_menu deactivate(x, ..., deep = TRUE)  # S3 method for navigatr_item deactivate(x, ..., deep = TRUE)

title: Activate or deactivate a menu item — activate
text: .data navigatr_nav_menu object. ... activate(), one variables passed dplyr::pull(). deactivate(), unused (extensibility). .add Whether add new variables path indices. FALSE (default value), menu deactivated first deactivate(). x navigatr_nav_menu object. deep TRUE (default value), deactivate recursively.

title: Activate or deactivate a menu item — activate
text: activate(), navigatr_item object. inherits class navigatr_nav_menu, menu displayed hierarchically. Otherwise, active data displayed. deactivate(), navigatr_nav_menu object.

title: Activate or deactivate a menu item — activate
code: library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union  mn1 <- new_nav_menu(key = c("band_members", "band_instruments"),                     value = list(band_members, band_instruments))  mn1 |>   activate(band_members) |>   filter(band == "Beatles") #> # ☒ band_members:     tibble [2 × 2] #> # ☐ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   name  band    #>   <chr> <chr>   #> 1 John  Beatles #> 2 Paul  Beatles  # Items can also be specified as integers mn1 |>   activate(2) #> # ☐ band_members:     tibble [3 × 2] #> # ☒ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   name  plays  #>   <chr> <chr>  #> 1 John  guitar #> 2 Paul  bass   #> 3 Keith guitar  mn1 |>   activate(-1) |>   deactivate() #> # ☐ band_members:     tibble [3 × 2] #> # ☐ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # Please `activate()`.  # To activate items in a nested menu, specify multiple variables mn2 <- new_nav_menu(key = c("key1", "key2"),                     value = list(mn1, mn1)) mn2 |>   activate(key1, band_members) #> # ☒ key1: nav_menu [2] #> #   ☒ band_members:     tibble [3 × 2] #> #   ☐ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> # ☐ key2: nav_menu [2] #> #  #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   name  band    #>   <chr> <chr>   #> 1 Mick  Stones  #> 2 John  Beatles #> 3 Paul  Beatles

title: Deprecated functions — new_menu
text: Deprecated functions

title: Deprecated functions — new_menu
code: new_menu(   key = character(),   value = list(),   attrs = NULL,   ...,   class = character() )

title: Deprecated functions — new_menu
text: key unique character vector. value list values corresponding keys. attrs data frame additional attributes items (empty data frame default). item becomes active, attrs added attributes. ... Additional arguments passed vctrs::new_data_frame(). class character vector subclasses passed vctrs::new_data_frame().

title: Deprecated functions — new_menu
text: navigatr_nav_menu object, subclass class data.frame.

what: Build a new input form — new_nav_input
title: Build a new input form — new_nav_input
text: create new input form, give new_nav_input() unique key corresponding list values. default, values empty characters. line shows menu items (keys left, value summaries right). summaries pillar::obj_sum outputs, can change printing methods. menu item can changed itemise().

title: Build a new input form — new_nav_input
code: new_nav_input(   key = character(),   value = list(character()),   ...,   class = character() )

title: Build a new input form — new_nav_input
text: key unique character vector. value list values corresponding keys. default, values empty characters. ... Additional arguments passed vctrs::new_data_frame(). class character vector subclasses passed vctrs::new_data_frame().

title: Build a new input form — new_nav_input
text: navigatr_nav_input object, subclass class data.frame.

title: Build a new menu — new_nav_menu
text: build new menu, give new_nav_menu() unique keys list corresponding values. line shows menu items (keys left, value summaries right). summaries pillar::obj_sum outputs, can change printing methods. menu item can accessed activate().

title: Build a new menu — new_nav_menu
code: new_nav_menu(   key = character(),   value = list(data.frame()),   attrs = NULL,   ...,   class = character() )

title: Build a new menu — new_nav_menu
text: key unique character vector. value list values corresponding keys. attrs data frame additional attributes items (empty data frame default). item becomes active, attrs added attributes. ... Additional arguments passed vctrs::new_data_frame(). class character vector subclasses passed vctrs::new_data_frame().

title: Build a new menu — new_nav_menu
text: navigatr_nav_menu object, subclass class data.frame.

title: Build a new menu — new_nav_menu
code: library(dplyr)  band <- new_nav_menu(key = c("band_members", "band_instruments"),                      value = list(band_members, band_instruments)) band #> # ☐ band_members:     tibble [3 × 2] #> # ☐ band_instruments: tibble [3 × 2] #> #  #> # Please `activate()`.  # You can also build a nested menu bands <- new_nav_menu(key = c("key1", "key2"),                       value = list(band, band)) bands #> # ☐ key1: nav_menu [2] #> # ☐ key2: nav_menu [2] #> #  #> # Please `activate()`.

title: Rename key names — rekey
text: Rename key names

title: Rename key names — rekey
code: rekey(.data, ...)  # S3 method for navigatr_nav rekey(.data, ...)  # S3 method for navigatr_item rekey(.data, ...)  rekey_with(.data, .fn, .keys = tidyselect::everything(), ...)

title: Rename key names — rekey
text: .data rekey(), navigatr_nav navigatr_item object. rekey_with(), navigatr_nav object. ... navigatr_nav objects, use new_name = old_name. navigatr_item objects, scalar character new key name. .fn function used transform selected .keys. .keys Keys rename; defaults keys.

title: Rename key names — rekey
text: navigatr_nav navigatr_item object.

title: navigatr 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-26 Fix vec_ptype_abbr() methods.

title: navigatr 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-11-20 Add rekey_with() change menu key name function. Rename new_menu() new_nav_menu(). Add new_nav_input() create input forms.

title: navigatr 0.1.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-05-14 Add itemise() update menu items. Change rekey() generic function. Change size summaries menus pillar::size_sum.navigatr_menu(). Update README.

title: navigatr 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-21 Add rekey() rename key menu item. Fix bug menu attributes changed properly. Fix bug occurs menus values tibble.

title: navigatr 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-26 first release.
